page.title: 04OUR HOMES IN PILSLEY
page.content:
I live in a semi-detached house. My house is in Station Road, Pilsley. It has three bedrooms, one bathroom, a lounge, a dining room, a kitchen, a conservatory, a cupboard for coats, a garage, three sheds and a small garden. In our house we have a cooker, an automatic washing machine, a coffee maker, three televisions and a food mixer. We have central Heating. Clare (11)
In our house we have three bedrooms, one living roome, one dining room and a kitchen. We are making a new garden and we are having a patio and a fish pond. In our house there are 4 people; my dad, my mum, my sister Joanne and me. We have a dog and seven goldfish. Nicola (11)
